entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Port Perry
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:14 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Uxbridge 09:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

Humidity: 81 %

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
